title: The On-Chain Case for an Imminent Bitcoin Bull Market Just Gained Strength

description: Blockchain researcher at the Tel Aviv-based cryptocurrency wallet startup, ZenGo has uncovered a vulnerability in major digital currency wallets, which could potentially result in Bitcoin double-spending. title: Bitcoin double-spending vulnerability uncovered in major crypto wallets

title: Kyber Network Doubles in a Month as Platform Upgrade Nears

description: A Russian court has reportedly declined a stolen Bitcoin repayment request because Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are not recognized as legal tender. title: Russian court declines stolen Bitcoin repayment request, says it’s not a property
